website_summaries.verdict: A chic linen cabinet that will dazzle in a modern or traditional bathroom.
pros: Includes 2 chrome oval-shaped doorknobs that are both eye-catching and durable
Offers 2 fixed interior shelves and 1 adjustable interior shelf to provide you with ample bathroom storage space
cons: Cabinet pieces sometimes fail to fit together properly during assembly

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but not necessarily cheaply priced.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. This thing is a mess. First of all, one of the legs didn’t have the protective plastic pieces and the other did, but not a huge deal. Assembly went okay until it was nearly completed, then I ran into troubles. One of the pieces was completely stripped and wouldn’t assemble properly. I attempted to remedy it to no avail. Unfortunately this prevented me from being able to assemble further. The shelf piece was also split, which I maybe could have just glued if it wasn’t for the other defective part. I would consider a different purchase - this one isn’t great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my bathroom. Enough self space. Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a house where the main bathroom had zero storage, so I was on the hunt for a versatile cabinet that we didn't have to screw into the wall. This was easy to assemble (don't take this to mean quick... it takes a while!) and wasn't missing any parts. I liked that the shelf heights are adjustable. The unit is space-efficient, super sturdy and handsome to boot. I almost ordered a second one I liked it so much, but I purged some items and got everything to fit in the one. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: A. McCrae

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Cheap, Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest particle board available. The (only) wood cracked when installing doors. Very unhappy will try to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: DiDonn57

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is perfect as a small pantry or as a linen cabinet. I was impressed with the very fast shipping (several days before it was promised) and with the incredibly sturdy packaging. For a small pantry, this provides a good amount of shelf space. Simple to put together. If I could give a half-star deduction, I would only because of a few misalignments between holes in the two thin cabinet rear sections and the pilot holes pre-drilled into the cabinet sides. But these weren't really an issue and the rear sections screwed to the cabinet sides just as easily as if the pilot holes had been aligned. Everything else aligned perfectly. Great piece, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: uh oh chango

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but inspect pieces for warping prior to assembling
customer_reviews.text: Needed glue to put pegs in side pieces, otherwise would require 2 people to assemble. The upper door was warped to where it won't stay closed. Can't find anywhere to contact the company to complain or replace the upper door. Didn't notice it was warped until I mounted the door on the cupboard. Otherwise, it's a sturdy and nice looking piece for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet for the space and money.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this cabinet. It came very well packed. I checked everything over, a few minor flaws. Everything came to build cabinet, but I had problems with the cam bolts. I broke two. I put the cabinet together on floor before assembling. I realized that I should probably glue the dowel rods because they didnt fit tight. I did this and let the cabinet dry overnight. Make sure you put the L shape in the shelves in front so doors will close. The cabinet has a very nice finish and I am pleased with it. Just be prepared for the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Oh So Useful!
customer_reviews.text: What an elegant little cabinet for my bathroom! It arrived 2 days early...a delightful surprise. We read the reviews and followed the advise carefully, as the instructions are lacking several "steps." Everything went together perfectly, and we now have exactly what we need to completely clear off the counter-top. The water-pic and electric tooth brush fit on one shelf, creams on another, etc. etc. It doesn't take up much space, but because of the height, it holds a lot of miscellaneous bathroom clutter.
customer_reviews.author: SusannaRoseAnnaDanna

customer_reviews.title: Low quality but does the trick
customer_reviews.text: The piece serves its purpose- gives you the elegant look although it’s obviously lower quality. As per most reviews, I also put the shelves in backwards. The instructions do not specify how to place them, so when the last step of placing the doors on the front arrived, I realized I would have to backtrack through the steps (undo everything) up until the shelf placement. It wasn’t difficult, but that is time lost general frustration of not getting it right the first time around.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was fairly difficult to build but made of good quality materials. The instruction drawings weren't accurate so it took a bit more time to figure out how to build. It's a little smaller than I had hoped and I wish more of the shelves were adjustable than just one. I also would have liked if the door hinges could have been installed either on the left or the right. We needed a tall narrow cabinet for our laundry room, so it worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Smithee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cabinet for the small space we have in our bathroom, holds plenty small items and looks pretty. The negative- directions are not the best..took about 2 hours for him to put it together. It has a paint chip and scratch. The stink from the finish took about a week to disappear. Bottom door does not align properly when closed and it's wobbly(mounting to wall definitely needed).. Overall, for the quality this should be priced at $65 not $120.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: NOT A HAPPY CAMPER!
customer_reviews.text: 2 panels have manufacturing defects. One the side piece was not glued & nails did not hold it, and the other, the back panel is warped which makes it show the glue and missing stain/paint. Would like to just replace these 2 panels or receive money off, but was not given these options. Don't want to return for replacement on entire item because difficult to re-package and it is heavy. Also, no phone number for Amazon, to talk to an actual person, to discuss what else can be done. Will just keep the item and hopefully try to repair ourselves. Not at all happy about being forced to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This little storage cabinet was the perfect addition to my bathroom! I don't have a linen closet in my bathroom, so this was perfect. It is pretty roomy considering it doesn't take up a lot of space in the bathroom. I am able to store towels, extra toilet paper, etc inside of it which is a big help! It was easy to put together (I did it without any help). It isn't "real" wood which makes it lighter and easier to move around. The only downside of it not being real wood is it's not as sturdy, but it isn't meant for holding books so the sturdiness isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: PetLover

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue was the assembly process. The dowels were very loose fitting and would fall out during the assembly process. Some of the screws were very short likely to pull out of the particle board. Use a second person to help and be aware that there will be lots of debris to clean up after assembly. Once assembled, the fit and functionality was acceptable for the price. I purchased two of these units for use in the laundry room. Would have liked adjustable shelves in both the top and bottom sections of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerjewery

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet works well for my needs (small bathroom with limited storage space). The directions for putting it together are not very clear and complicated. It takes two people to assemble, but once you work your way through the puzzle, it's worth it. It has a bit of a stink from the finish. I am hoping with a bit more time it will dissipate. Otherwise, this is a great piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. Can't think it was a 100.00 holes didn't line up on back panels, shelves crack, wood chipped on frame. All in all a pc. Of junk. But after you spend all the time it took to put together who is sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Delores A Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts to out it together.. Guess that's to be expected but I didn't. Kind of ikea like but loved it when done. Looks like nice quality. Color and style as pictured. I'd buy it again. I have it in my bathroom but it could go anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is way too expensive for the quality of this. It came broken and i had to paint it myself to touch it up. It took 3 weeks to get so i didnt want to return it because we were desperate for bathroom storage. Ended up buying this to store towels and TOWELS DONT FIT. So dont buy this to put towels in. The inside measures 10in wide only. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Branden Bays

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together, but fits perfectly in small places
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are questionable to follow it did take me more than 2 hours to put together by myself. It’s not perfect, but does the job and fits in the small place needed for. After reading reviews I told myself it was going to be a process and be patient lol. Well packaged and had all tools needed including extra parts.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Linda J

customer_reviews.title: Overall a decent piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: This thing was fairly easy to assemble except for a few hiccups. The allen wrench screws are terrible for your wrists, but we got them in just fine. The bottom side pieces had a couple cracks but nothing unsightly. My two main issues are that the bottom front rail (piece H) is about 1/4" too short and that the back panels don't overlap flush. Pictures provided of both these issues.
customer_reviews.author: MadMomma2430

customer_reviews.title: waste of money and time...
customer_reviews.text: If I did not have so much time invested I would've returned it. The screws stripped out and most of the cams didn't hold. I had to rig most of it and spent a lot of time doing so. It looks good now that it's done but not worth the frustration! Surely not worth $120. Maybe $10....... maybe
customer_reviews.author: David M Christensen

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good little cabinet. It fits my towels (just barely) and some toiletry stuff. I took a star off because it wasn’t the easiest to assemble at first, and the unit is a little cheaper looking than I hoped for. However, this was meant to be a temporary fix, so I’m overall satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: YeahMan

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but useable
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were not easily read. Also getting the supplies out of that package if they have the screws and everything in is very difficult. Also while putting it together some of the screw holes pre-drilled did not line up with the items that you were putting on as in the doors.
customer_reviews.author: brian k metzgar

customer_reviews.title: ☹️
customer_reviews.text: It sucked it was cheep as crap my husband put all the new furniture together we have gotten and we have got a lot and this cabinet brook in 1/2 when it went together and feel to the ground so this was not good he glued the hole cabinet together!!! and it’s lopsided and it is what it is still need to use it so there my story on that crappy cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little flimsy. The directions are absolutely horrible. Very little screws if you don’t know what each screw goes with then you are out of luck! This is by far the worse when it comes to the directions. As far as the unit itself goes it’s pretty decent. I use it for my kids snacks. But I wouldn’t dare put anything else in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is not the best quality but it serves my purpose for the price, it is very nice and sturdy when I received this item one of the pieces was scratched I emailed the manufacturer and they sent me a replacement of the piece that was damaged great customer service got back to me within a couple of hours other then that i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for a mini pantry. It works for its purpose and was easy to assemble. I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Monisa L. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This product was horrible. I purchased this for my bathroom and it was simple to put together, however, the cam locks that were used, wouldn't stay in place, half of them bent once they interlocked, the other half, just wouldn't stay locked. I got the entire thing together and once I stood it up to move it, the one whole side of it came apart, the shelves were falling out. I tried to put it back together and it just kept falling apart. I took it apart, packed it back up in the box it came in and I returned it for a refund. Bought an entirely different shelving unit. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage
customer_reviews.text: One of the sides came busted up, I had to pull out the wood glue to fix it, possibly happened in shipping. I put it together by myself, I found it to be easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Powers

customer_reviews.title: Fine for what it is
customer_reviews.text: We use it as extra pantry space. It works fine. Shelves don't move very easily. I was hoping to be able to fit cereal boxes in it but we can't. It's fine though we use it for cans and cat treats.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good looking slim cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Slim, stylish, exactly what I needed for the space. The feet on mine aren’t level, but other than that, it’s a great little cabinet. The shelf width is much less than the outside width, but that is actually noted in the description. About the same amount of frustration to assemble as most needs assembly pieces. Good value. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Attractive storage solution
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised with the quality and appearance of this sweet slender cabinet. A perfectly lovely storage piece for my cottage’s half bath / laundry. (Late afternoon shadow-play is not permitting my photos to fully capture the crisp, pure white color the piece is.)
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Missing Some Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet which holds quite a lot. Gave two stars because half of the instruction pages were blank. The instructions also send you to a website that doesn't exist. My husband was able to put it together finally, but blank pages instead of instructions should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly peice of junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wobbly peice of junk. Do not buy. Also it is very small and does not fit towels let alone linen. I don't know why they call it a linen closet. Very misleading. This is not worth more than 40-50 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure after reading reviews, but took a chance and my dad and husband put it together and there were not any issues and it fits perfectly in a small space next to our sinks and it holds my husbands items perfectly. I would definitely recommend it for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: S. Row

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty starting this build on my own, but with a little help I was able to get started and finish it off by myself. I am very pleased with the sturdiness and beautiful clean look of this unit. The directions could be tweaked a little to make assembly easier but overall I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RRR

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not big enough for thick towels
customer_reviews.text: Have three stars because it was confusing to put together and it hardly fits anyyyyy towels. Maybe 3 on each shelf or 2 fluffy towels. Not enough room for all my towels but perfect for the size in the corner by the bathroom. Looks expensive and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: After putting the white linen tower together, it was learned that the towerwas leaning off about one inch. However, in order to get a refund the tower had to be broken down, purchase a box in order to return the product to amazon. When you purchase this type of product on line be mindful that it might be defective. The storage space was exactly what was needed and the appearance looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: BFaye

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy cabinet for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is attractive, reasonably sturdy, and has ample storage space for the bathroom essentials that won't fit in your medicine cabinet. It also has a small footprint that makes it suitable for small spaces- itonly needs about 18" of wall space. It's extremely easy to assemble, but you do need 2 sets of hands, one to hold the panels in place while the other screws them in. It's a very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Louzader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were vague to say the least. Then I couldn't get the cams to lock properly. One of the dowels pushed through and damaged the outside. If it wasn't such an ordeal to return it I would have and I'm sure Amazon would have taken it back no questions asked. I'm totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JudyG

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: I had two shelves to put together and this one is not good quality and the directions were hard to follow. I will not buy this brand again. I put together another unit from Sauder and that is top quality compared to this..
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Conner

customer_reviews.title: Serves a purpose but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a linen/bathroom cabinet as our bathroom has none. The shelves are wide enough to only hold washcloths and hand towels. Still have to find somewhere else to put the other towels. The material isn't as nice as I thought it would be either. It was fairly easy to put together but one of the inserts on the base was stripped so the cam lock wouldn't tighten. Once everything else was put together it held. The cabinet will do for now but we will be replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Glass

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed for several reasons. First the top door does not align nor close properly it’s actually slightly bent in the middle it has a curve to it. I either return it or keep it and save myself the headache and just deal with it as is but write this comment so you have a heads up .
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price. 1.5 hr assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for price. Tall so find a stud and screw to wall. Use styrofoam from delivery box to use as spacer between cabinet and wall when you screw to wall. To make up for space created behind the cabinet by baseboard or tile.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Bought it for my daughters room (7 yrs old) to hide away her messy shelves. It’s perfect. It’s like a cute cabinet sized “locker” she calls it and she had such fun organizing all her stuff in it. I no longer have to walk by her messy chaotic book shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Dori Easley

customer_reviews.title: Serves a great purpose in our house.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place to store medications for my husband. He’s a transplant patient and takes MANY medications daily. This fit the bill! It is small enough to fit perfectly into the space I had planned to place it in, and it was big enough to hold the extra medicine. I really like it! My only problem with it was the assembly. That’s not my forte’, so after much frustration I got some help and managed to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing, nightmare to open
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this - looks nice. Took too long to deliver, and then once it finally arrived, unpacking it was not fun. Finally removed all the pieces from the box while little pellets of styrofoam flew all over the room only to find that 2 of the hardware items were missing. This isn't something that is easy to pack back in the box. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Trebor Z. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The directions were confusing, causing us to put the shelves in backwards. Removing the shelves to place them in correctly caused a lot of damage and now the shelves will not stay in! This is a piece of junk! If I could return it I would but do not want to take it all apart again! So ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.author: cathleen gast

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 1 star because it was cracked down the side. Box was fine but ofcourse it was cracked on the last portion I had to put together and at that point I didn't want to take all apart and box it up to haul to ups.
customer_reviews.author: Chassidy Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is gorgeous but DAMN was it hard to put together! The instructions were sooooooo not helpful. I live alone, so was assembling by myself. It took right at 3 hours, a lot of wine, and every curse word I know in multiple languages. Looks great finished and is super sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine gamblin

customer_reviews.title: Nice item..
customer_reviews.text: Was worried at first that the item may come in damaged. Especially after I saw how UPS just slammed by my door. After wiping down the box, I was happy no extensive damage. Just a small indentation on one of the corners. But the piece once setup is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald P

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cabinet. The color goes well in my new bathroom renovation. The instructions were well put together and easy to follow. I was a little sceptical about purchasing it because of the negative reviews but I had no problem with the assembly from start to finish. It is a very elegant piece and the wood quality is great and fits perfectly in the space provided in my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: One of the parts was a duplicate right side so it did not come out 100% perfect but for the value it’s not so bad, I didn’t bother calling for replacement considering all the effort to build it and the placement in my house, it’s sturdy n small
customer_reviews.author: Robert Martino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two to use in the bathroom as I had no cabinet space. The cabinets were easy to assemble and only took about 30 minutes to assemble the first one. Every piece was marked perfectly. The reason I gave it a 4 for overall rating is because the cabinets could have been two to four inches wider especially if you are going to use for towels. Otherwise, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I like that it holds my bathroom supplies, but it was frustrating getting the screws to stay in place. Some area's came loose, causing doors to become unsigned and hard to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: tracey s

customer_reviews.title: On the small side
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it except I bought it to store extra towels and they don’t fit. It needs to be about 4 inches larger wide and deep. I feel stuck with it because how do you ship back something you’ve assembled?
customer_reviews.author: Momma-lab-lover

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of packaging?
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these items and both boxes came with a broken piece. Not sure if its from the shipping or not but the pieces were on the very inside and packaged snugly so I have a feeling they may have been broken before packaging. Anyway, assembly was easy enough to follow, a bit flimsy but it is coming from China so what can I expect. One of the door knobs just didn't even fit, going to have that replaced later. Not a big deal. Even with the broken parts, was still able to assemble it but it's not 100% sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: New York JM

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t recommend - the reviews are honest. This isn’t good quality. It’s very small and it’s already starting to break. I’ve only had it for two days... get something else. You’ll regret purchasing this
customer_reviews.author: John Onesky

customer_reviews.title: One issue, otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup, but the measurements on the lower back piece were slightly off so we had to trim it ourselves. We got a nice deal on it though so I’m feeling okay about it!
customer_reviews.author: jes

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: All in all I love it! It is very sturdy, functional and very pretty. The only thing is that one of the doors does not line up perfect so it doesn’t always close right off. But that isn’t really even an issue. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer2011

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ended up return it. Was way to small to hold pretty much any bathroom items.... got it to hold my towels and other items even folded super small they didn't fit nice. Plus the doors wouldn't stay closed unless you lifted up on them. Very disappointed with this item. But the customer service was great and they returned it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I like this linen shelf unit so much I’m getting another for my bathroom!!! I put the unit together myself in about 45mins. Good deal for a compact size! Purchased my second unit & love it even more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JuliaB68

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest piece of trash I have ever seen. The cam bolts would not stay in and would not tighten. Wobbly...I could continue best way to sum it up is trash
customer_reviews.author: jimmy willis jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good for tight space
customer_reviews.text: Cracks mdf if you screw too tightly. We left the doors off because they were so incredibly Cheap looking. We filled the holes and painted. Works great for small amount of storage in a tight space.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good buy. Looks nice in my back hall. I do wish all the shelves were adjustable. Assembly was pretty involved but we had no major problems.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Two colors of white and knobs come off
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. The white doors aren’t the same color at the cabinets. It is not extremely noticeable for someone like me, but all the type A people noticed it right away. And the screws for the knobs were too short so the knobs kept falling off easy fix by going to homedepo and buying longer screws. Besides that it’s sturdy , perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Bordenca

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product for the price! Terrible directions for assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The product was chipped coming right out of the box. The location of the chip luckily doesn’t show because I hate returning things. There are gaps that will need to be caulked before using. It’s a $30 cabinet marked up to $100.
customer_reviews.author: john vreeman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cabinet - Perfect for our Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was super easy to assemble and provides a slightly more upscale look than most. We use it in our bathroom to hold odds and ends that we don't want out in the open.
customer_reviews.author: BPotts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Super Easy to Build
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks! It was super easy to put together. I’ve put pieces together in the past and the doors were either difficult to adjust or were never quite right. However these are PERFECT! It’s a beautiful study cabinet for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: K @ S Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money... I’ve put together dozens of similar cabinets and bookshelves in my life, and this was by far the most frustrating. Not only do the pieces not quite fit together, but the thing will fall apart the minute you try to move it. I’m very disappointed. Walmart has better quality furniture than this at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Megan in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised by the quality of the parts and how easy to assemble! Very sturdy and has a lots of storage capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Wewilly

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price but funny smell
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it has a funky smell even after a month or more of use
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Look at the"L" pieces: no corner notch. The actual pieces do have a notch. The notch goes in the back corner of the cabinet. If you don't do that, because the instructions don't show the notch orientation, you end up finding out that the door won't close. Then you have to disassemble a lot to put them in correctly.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy piece of furniture for the price! Packaged well and wasn’t too difficult to put together! Instructions could have been better but definitely not the worst I have ever used! This piece is being used in a bathroom for linens and I think it will work perfect for the small space
customer_reviews.author: Britnee

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It fit perfectly in the small space in my bathroom. It took my husband several hours to assemble. So, if you are not handy with tools, you will need someone to put it together for you.
customer_reviews.author: K. CarverAmazon CustomerRick

customer_reviews.title: SMALL SPACE FIT
customer_reviews.text: I like this as it fits well in a small space and it does hold a bit more than I thought it would, it does not line up perfectly with the predrilled holes when assembling, and the hinge we needed to add longer screws than it came with, but it is a minor fix.
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done! The height is pretty much 5’6.
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is smaller than I expected it to be. I am “5’6” and it as tall as me. But that was no major problem. It did come damaged and had to be repaired with small nails which was unfortunate. Other than that it serves my purpose of having a bathroom storage closet. I would recommend it if you just needed a little extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: La'Shell V.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fun to assemble pretty good quality, nice little storage area for my toothbrush toilet paper and things! I do recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: SaiBerMaster

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful organization for my small space
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for the small spaces in my bathroom. I also wanted to protect the wood from liquids, so I bought these to put my shampoo, lotion, and other liquid products in:
customer_reviews.author: coheedstar

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to take A LOT of time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are absolutely terrible. Have to completely take it apart twice. I’ve put together many pieces of furniture in the past. This is the absolute worst!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions carefully.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the two fixed shelves backward and the top door wouldn't close. It was fairly easy to loosen the cam locks and pull the shelves and turn around. Other than that, very easy to put together. Nice quality and fits small bathroom well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Miller

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2 person job to assemble. Towels have to be rolled in order to fit correctly. Spend a little more money and buy a better product at a Home Goods or Pier 1 store.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. I purchased as a temporary extra storage for my small kitchen but cute enough to keep when I move.
customer_reviews.author: CTex

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited space!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great extra storage unit for my bathroom. My Space is limited so was looking to maximize and this fit perfect in my corner. It came with lots of parts but directions easy to follow. Appears sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: cathy s

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the very high quality of this. The directions for assemble were not perfect, but as long as you take your time, the results will be fabulous. I assembled it on my dining room table - a nice flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jay F Hiselman

customer_reviews.title: This was a very bad purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Picture is so deceiving. This product is not at all sturdy. Pieces did not fit squarely. Cam nuts were flimsy and bent when tightened. Very cheaply made. Definitely NOT worth the cost. Extreme buyers remorse!
customer_reviews.author: D. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute little cabinet but not the sturdiest. It suffices small items in the corner of my room and easy to match with rest of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kilihea

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: So I really don’t write reviews that much but the quality on this one is so poor that it broke while assembling !! What a bummer:( Assembly instructions are horrible and it took a long time to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Rash

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but stinky.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but not easy to assemble. It took my husband 2 hours to put together and he’s very handy. 8 pages of instructions. 😱 Had a lingering chemical odor for days.
customer_reviews.author: DianaSG

customer_reviews.title: Missing Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I liked the unit, but the company seems to not have a good quality control process since there were various area that lacked paint.
customer_reviews.author: nycboy7

customer_reviews.title: Great style, very sturdy, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some great storage to tuck into a small space that wouldn't look or feel cheap. This is exactly what I hoped for, and it was easy for me to assemble solo.
customer_reviews.author: LAJEAN LAWSON

customer_reviews.title: Take your time.
customer_reviews.text: The packing was unbelievable. It could have fallen off a truck and not damaged. The instructions did not say which way the shelves go. They are notched on one side and they go in back. Other than this it took about an hour to assemble. PS I glued all the calls in place to make it stiffer. Looks great and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cabinet but awful to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It seriously does take two people to assemble. Would be helpful if each piece would show front with arrow. But with a whole lot of patience you end up with a very nice cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: zzz

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 overflow storage unit  with small footprint!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for overflow storage in master bathroom. Took some time to assemble, but fairly easy if you sort pieces from shipping box. One door did not line up w/ opening, but I repositioned inside magnet. That didn’t correct it 100%, but it’s livable. Might be a little top -heavy and need to be anchored to wall if you have kids.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. in TN

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and so far have only assembled one since it was difficult. Someday I may put the other one together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: love The design. I needed a slim Cabinet and this looks great in my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelidoll

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst product I've ever bought from Amazon. Pieces arrived broken and missing hardware. Its barely standing with shelves that hang because there weren't enough pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Florek

customer_reviews.title: Bright white Linen Closet. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright white linen closet. Quality is good. Doesn’t look cheap. Will definitely do for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: LilyNC

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: It has the perfect dimensions for my bathroom. Also, it has great quality, the money I pay was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ester Nora Arrieta

customer_reviews.title: Good quality perfect space and size!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to find something to use as a small pantry. Everything came perfect instructions in the box and parts were labeled to help assemble. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

product_meta.title: Elegant Home Fashions Adriana Linen Tower, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteAdriana linen tower in White has an elegant Crown molded top and shaker legs. The piece has two decorative louvered doors that offer ample storage. The decorative louvered door keeps your toiletries hidden and add style to your bathroom. The Shaker legs and arched decorative skirt on Bottom front and sides offers architectural elegance. It is also has two fixed shelves and one adjustable interior shelf to add the durability and functionality. It also features chrome finished knobs for easy opening. This cabinet comes with assembly hardware.
feature_bullets: Assembly required. Hardware included. Tools not provided.
Door magnet and hinges are pre-hung
Specially designed hardware package allows for easy checking and assembly
Constructed of MDF for lasting durability
Inner Top: 31" H; inner bottom: 20.5" H
Maximum shelf weight capacity: 10 lb. Per shelf with properly installed anchors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars534 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
